p: The mRNA was purified from total RNA using the mRNA purification kit (Invitrogen) following manufacturer’s instructions. Paired-end RNA-seq libraries were prepared according to the Illumina’s library construction protocol. The libraries were sequenced on Illumina HiSeq 2000 platform (Illumina) in the Beijing Institutes of Life Science (Chinese Academy of Sciences). FASTQ files of raw-reads were produced and sorted by barcodes.
